CustomField.description: This field tracks Campaign funnel stage (Top, Middle, Bottom) that helps marketing ops to better identify metrics of Tactics applied throughout the campaign funnel.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Top: Awareness resources addressing prospect’s unique pain points with problem/solution content. Middle: Consideration resources for product/service to fit prospect’s needs. Bottom: Decision resources with in-depth product/service/competitive content.
CustomField.label: Funnel
